name: Fly Hunter VR
description:
You want action, you hate fly or other insect, Fly Hunter is a game for you !

Put your dinner in the microwave to launch mutant insect wave.

You can shoot shop panel to make spawn special weapon or use your environment like a true warrior, don't miss to take a look at your frigde okay ?

Use pansy, laser pansy, electric pansy and ... some guns yeaah ! To beat them all !
